{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/title|address}}
{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr void* address() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the underlying address of the {{tt|coroutine_handle}}. The return value is non-null if and only if the current value of the {{tt|coroutine_handle}} is obtained from a promise object of a coroutine.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The underlying address.

===Notes===
The return value is non-null for specialization {{lc|std::noop_coroutine_handle}}, because a {{tt|std::noop_coroutine_handle}} cannot be created without referring to a no-op coroutine.
